Critical Evaluation


User Experience

We constantly considered HCI design principles ,visibility,consistancy,simplicity and feedback,when we were implementing this project.
We ensure our users have good user experience by:
1.Our key functionalities are very visible in our user interface. 1.Everytime users make an action such as deleting an appointment,we tell him whether the action is successful or not using notification messages. 2.When users provides invaild data while filling a form, there is a clear message notifing them the problem.
